sections.heading: enforcement.If a tribunal of this state does not recognize and enforce a Convention support order in its entirety, it shall enforce any severable part of the order
sections.text: An application or direct request may seek recognition and partial enforcement of a Convention support order.SourceLaws 2015, LB415, ยง 5

42-748.09.Partial enforcement.

If a tribunal of this state does not recognize and enforce a Convention support order in its entirety, it shall enforce any severable part of the order. An application or direct request may seek recognition and partial enforcement of a Convention support order.

SourceLaws 2015, LB415, ยง 56.
